title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2107.4 - Answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2107.4 - Answer

State Regulations
A person who has been served with a copy of an
application or a notice of a proceeding shall have seven days from the date of
mailing in which to answer, except that a tenant shall have 15 days from the
date of mailing within which to answer where the application was made pursuant
to section
2102.3
(b)(5)
of
this Title. Every answer must be verified, and an original and one copy shall
be filed with the local rent administrator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2107.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
